title: Email verification wont send. Can't login and can't get into support either do to this.
body: As the title says. I am having trouble getting my email verification to be sent to my email and I can't go through support to help me with that since it requires a verified email to login into it. Can I get some help?

replies.body: Not to worry, we can still help update your info!  You can instead fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which does not require signing into the ticketing center.  Instead, the form will allow you to use an email that you do have access to!
Can I please get some help?
